column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////i loooove jinya ramen bar. so delicious. i always get the spicy chicken ramen & add chicken sabbaro
column5: seasoned egg & extra broth. the soup is so flavorful
column6: i could literally eat it everyday..(not kidding
column7: i've eaten it 4 times this week). also the salmon poke mini tacos are so good. put extra lime on them. no complaints about jinya. 5 stars all day
